page.title: 20AUTHORS
page.content:
{This project}is the work of Forms 1H, 1R, and 1G (1984-5) of Heanor Gate School and pupils of Mapperley Church of England School.
{The work was co-ordinated by:-} Wayne Allsopp, Lisa Clarke, Karen Durose, Mandy Fogg, Adrian Gillott, Mark Greaves, Rachael Hallsworth, Sarah Marshall, Vanessa Parkins and James Rodgers (Heanor Gate School) { {Supervision was by}:- Mr.A.Cherry, Mr.R.Janes, Mr.T.J.Larimore and Mr.G.Partridge (Heanor Gate School) and Mr.J.Treseder (Mapperley Church of England School).
